instruction: Describe the main characters and premise for a story set in the future.
output: The story is set in the far future, in a solar-powered world where resources are scarce and technology is highly advanced. The main characters are two friends, Kelly and Nia, who unexpectedly come into possession of a mysterious object with unknown powers. They soon discover that this object has the power to alter time and space and grant them powerful abilities, but they have no idea how to use it. They must learn quickly as they stumble into a complex conspiracy involving a powerful and dangerous organization that threatens to take control of the world. It is up to them to stop them and restore balance to the world. Along the way, they will face incredible dangers and uncover the real purpose for the mysterious object.
